articles.author: Kumar Rupesh, Sumeet Kavthale
articles.title: IND-C vs PAK-C WCL 2024 Final Live Score: India and Pakistan Champions clash in final at Edgbaston - India TV News
articles.description: IND-C vs PAK-C WCL 2024 Final Live Score: India Champions made a sensational comeback in the semi-final against Australia after losing their last three group-stage games while Pakistan thrashed West Indies to enter the final of the WCL 2024 edition.
articles.content: India Champions Squad: Yuvraj Singh (c), Robin Uthappa (wk), Ambati Rayudu, Suresh Raina, Yusuf Pathan, Irfan Pathan, Gurkeerat Singh Mann, Pawan Negi, Vinay Kumar, Harbhajan Singh, Dhawal Kulkarni, … [+368 chars]

articles.author: Brian Windhorst
articles.title: Durant again misses practice; Kerr unconcerned - ESPN
articles.description: Kevin Durant missed Team USA practice again Saturday with a calf strain and likely won't play when the Americans face Australia in a friendly set for Monday.
articles.content: ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates -- Team USA has relocated halfway across the world but is still in a holding pattern with star Kevin Durant, who missed practice again Saturday with a calf strain and … [+1920 chars]
